attributes.action: Peadophiles to be given life sentencing. Life should mean LIFE
attributes.additional_details: We have volunteers who solely go out looking for these disgusting people. If it wasn’t for them half of them wouldn’t get caught. We need to protect our children and others from these vile idiots.
attributes.background: We have disgusting people walking our streets all around the uk, and even on our doorstep. Signing a sex offenders register is doing nothing to punish these vile vile people.
